SYN_015_4_1:
Procedure: Rigid Bronch, Laser/Coring BI.
- Indication: BI tumor obstruction.
- Findings: Large polypoid tumor BI (100% blocked). RUL 30% blocked.
- Action: Nd:YAG Laser. Rigid 'apple coring'. Suction removal. APC cleanup.
- Result: BI 85% open proximal, 60% distal. RUL 80% open.
- Plan: No stent (patient pref). Oncology referral.
